    def compare_policy_protocol(self, category_type, split_type=None):
        injection_data = self.get_microbial_policy_details(category_type)
        if split_type is not None:
            response_data = self.get_microbial_protocol_details(category_type, split_type.get('split_type'))
        else:
            response_data = self.get_microbial_protocol_details(category_type, split_type=None)
    
        for equipment_id, data_response in response_data.items():
            swab_limit = data_response.get('swab', {}).get('swabLimit')
            swab_per_unit_area = data_response.get('swab', {}).get('perUnitArea', {})
    
            rinse_limit = data_response.get('rinse', {}).get('rinseLimit')
            rinse_per_unit_volume = data_response.get('rinse', {}).get('perUnitVolume', {})
    
            endo_limit = data_response.get('endotoxin_rinse', {}).get('rinseLimit')
            endo_per_unit_volume = data_response.get('endotoxin_rinse', {}).get('perUnitVolume', {})
